SEARCH
Package music

Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
music.MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer extends Object
Class of a music player that can play notes using JFugue
Author:
nickyecen

  • Constructor Details

    • MusicPlayer

      private MusicPlayer(int volume, Instrument instrument, int octave) throws MidiUnavailableException
      Constructs a MusicPlayer with a defined volume, Instrument and octave
      Parameters:
      volume - the volume of how loud the Note will be
      instrument - the Instrument that the Note will use
      octave - the octave in which each Note will be played
      Throws:
      MidiUnavailableException
